com.nexmo.sdk.core.service

Class BaseService<T extends BaseResponse>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.app.Service
          • com.nexmo.sdk.core.service.BaseService<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - expected response type.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.content.ComponentCallbacks2
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CheckService, TokenService, VerifyService

    public abstract class BaseService<T extends BaseResponse>
extends android.app.Service
    Wrapper class used for constructing and sending Http requests to Nexmo services.

    • Method Detail

      • onBind

        public android.os.IBinder onBind(android.content.Intent intent)
        Description copied from class: android.app.Service
        Return the communication channel to the service. May return null if clients can not bind to the service. The returned IBinder is usually for a complex interface that has been described using aidl.

        Note that unlike other application components, calls on to the IBinder interface returned here may not happen on the main thread of the process. More information about the main thread can be found in Processes and Threads.

        Specified by:
        onBind in class android.app.Service
        Parameters:
        intent - The Intent that was used to bind to this service, as given to Context.bindService. Note that any extras that were included with the Intent at that point will not be seen here.
        Returns:
        Return an IBinder through which clients can call on to the service.

      • isSignatureInvalid

        public static boolean isSignatureInvalid(NexmoClient nexmoClient,
                         BaseResponse response,
                         Response result)
        Validate if the response signature was supplied and if it matches the expected value.
        Parameters:
        nexmoClient - The NexmoClient object that sends the request.
        response - The http response parsed as a BaseResponse
        result - The un-parsed response message.
        Returns:
        true if the signature is invalid, false otherwise.
